=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 13:32:18

ID: CL3YNPS_00
From: Iman Rojo <Iman.Rojo@chalhoub.com>
To: Marco Arletti <Marco.Arletti@me.zimmermann.com>
CC: Marine Hutin <Marine.Hutin@me.zimmermann.com>; Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>; Alexandre Santos <alexandre.santos@chalhoub.com>; Shereen Omar <Shereen.Omar@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-09-04 11:05
Subject: Zimmermann Bahrain Insurance Policy Requirements 
--------------------------------------------------
Hi Marco, 

Hope you’re well

Please find attached the KYC that needs to be filled out along with the below documents to be provided for the insurance policy under Zimmermann Bahrain WLL. 

*	Memorandum of association copy
*	Shareholders’ identification document copies
*	Directors’ identification document copies, if not in shareholder list. Same for the authorized signatory.
*	
	Ultimate Beneficiary Chain to be established until all natural persons are established, and documentations of all entities provided.

Kindly share any available document for Hagop to be able to proceed with the internal supplier creation. 

Please let me know if you have any questions

--------------------------------------------------
ID: CL3YNPS_01
From: Marco Arletti <Marco.Arletti@me.zimmermann.com>
To: Iman Rojo <Iman.Rojo@chalhoub.com>
CC: Marine Hutin <Marine.Hutin@me.zimmermann.com>; Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>; Alexandre Santos <alexandre.santos@chalhoub.com>; Shereen Omar <Shereen.Omar@chalhoub.com>; Angela Photios <angela.photios@zimmermann.com>; Nancy Liu <nancy.liu@zimmermann.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-09-04 16:25
Subject: RE: Zimmermann Bahrain Insurance Policy Requirements 
--------------------------------------------------
Hello Iman

PFA the filled in document. It is missing Jasmina’s signature. Will ask her PA to get it signed. 

 

Regarding the documents requested

 

*	Memorandum of association copy: missing, will be signed by mr. Buhindi soon (next week)
*	Shareholders’ identification document copies; FZCO TL is here attached , mr. Buhindi as well.
*	Directors’ identification document copies, if not in shareholder list. Same for the authorized signatory. Here attached 
*	Ultimate Beneficiary Chain to be established until all natural persons are established, and documentations of all entities provided. This is what we usually share as ZIM. Hope it will suffice ,as every financial institution might ask for more details. This is signed by our Group CFO MARK

Kindly share any available document for Hagop to be able to proceed with the internal supplier creation.

Hello Iman

PFA the filled in document. It is missing Jasmina’s signature. Will ask her PA to get it signed.

 

Regarding the documents requested

 

*	Memorandum of association copy: missing, will be signed by mr. Buhindi soon (next week)
*	Shareholders’ identification document copies; FZCO TL is here attached , mr. Buhindi as well.
*	Directors’ identification document copies, if not in shareholder list. Same for the authorized signatory. Here attached
*	Ultimate Beneficiary Chain to be established until all natural persons are established, and documentations of all entities provided. This is what we usually share as ZIM. Hope it will suffice ,as every financial institution might ask for more details. This is signed by our Group CFO MARK

From: Iman Rojo <Iman.Rojo@chalhoub.com <mailto:Iman.Rojo@chalhoub.com> >
Sent: Thursday, 4 September 2025 11:05 AM
To: Marco Arletti <Marco.Arletti@me.zimmermann.com <mailto:Marco.Arletti@me.zimmermann.com> >
Cc: Marine Hutin <Marine.Hutin@me.zimmermann.com <mailto:Marine.Hutin@me.zimmermann.com> >; Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> >; Alexandre Santos <Alexandre.Santos@chalhoub.com <mailto:Alexandre.Santos@chalhoub.com> >; Shereen Omar <Shereen.Omar@chalhoub.com <mailto:Shereen.Omar@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: Zimmermann Bahrain Insurance Policy Requirements

 

Hi Marco, 

 

Hope you’re well

 

Please find attached the KYC that needs to be filled out along with the below documents to be provided for the insurance policy under Zimmermann Bahrain WLL. 

*	Memorandum of association copy
*	Shareholders’ identification document copies
*	Directors’ identification document copies, if not in shareholder list. Same for the authorized signatory.
*	Ultimate Beneficiary Chain to be established until all natural persons are established, and documentations of all entities provided.

Kindly share any available document for Hagop to be able to proceed with the internal supplier creation. 

 

Please let me know if you have any questions

 

Best,

Iman

IMAN ROJO
